titleStmt.title: Apophthegmes new and old. Collected by the Right Honourable, Francis Lo. Verulam, Viscount St. Alban
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Haviland] for Hanna Barret, and Richard Whittaker, and are to be sold at the Kings head in Pauls Chuch-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
